item.description:
Are you a stingy NH resident or wannabe who won't spare a penny for charity but will donate your time and skills? Been wanting to use your photographic skills to help those in need? Been naughty most of your life and looking for an easy way to repent?

If any of the above apply to you, consider lending your time and expertise to a good cause, The 2012 Help Portrait event at SOPHA in Manchester.

On Saturday, September 29th SOPHA, in partnership with New Hampshire Catholic Charities, will be undertaking its largest philanthropic effort to date: they will be creating portraits for hundreds of families in need.

The goal is large - to shoot and deliver 300 portraits in one day. And they are going to need a lot of help!

To find out more or get involved, use the following links:

  • More Information
  • Frequently Asked Questions
  • Get Involved! (volunteer, donate, or get your organization involved)
  • Volunteer to Help

Feel free to RSVP for this meetup if you're going to help out to boast about what a good doobie you are despite what your friends say, but be sure to sign up using the volunteer signup form so the good folks at SOPHA know you're coming, can send you pertinent information, and can allocate you accordingly.
item.how_to_find_us: Come to the studio. Details on parking, arrival time, and where to go will be forwarded to those that sign up.
item.name: A Good Deed, Indeed - SOPHA's Help Portrait Project
